detail_desc: Gilet in soft faux fur with a concealed button at the top. Lined.
Tube scarf in a soft rib knit. Length 50 cm, circumference 65 cm.

Sandals in shimmering metallic imitation leather with covered block heels and platforms. Wide foot straps and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Platform 4.5 cm. Heel 8 cm.

Knee-length dress in a crinkled cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps and an elasticated trim at the back. Embroidery and a decorative bow with tassels at the top, and a hemstitched seam at the top and hem. Lined.
Blouse in airy supersoft modal with long ties at the waist and long, wide sleeves with elasticated cuffs.
Short skirt in airy chiffon. High waist with wide smocking to create a fitted style at the top and width at the hem. Jersey lining.
Slim-fit chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Sweatshirt in a cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with worn details in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and tapered legs.

Fully lined bikini top with a knot detail at the front and underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Ties at the back of the neck and a metal fastener at the back. Super lift.

Waist bag in imitation leather with a soft suede front. Adjustable waist strap with a metal buckle, an outer compartment with a zip that has a braided tab, and a zipped inner compartment. Lined in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Depth 3.5 cm, height 16 cm, width 28 cm.
Hat in braided paper straw with a grosgrain band inside. Width of brim 14 cm.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with appliqués on the front, a round neck and buttons down the front. Scalloped trim around the neckline and cuffs, and a ribbed hem with short slits in the sides.
Bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with a collar and short puff sleeves with scalloped, crocheted trims. Press-studs at the back of the neck and at the crotch.
Shorts in a cotton weave with a zip fly and button, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Slim Fit.
Top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Oversized shirt jacket in woven fabric with a soft brushed inside. Collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button and diagonal side pockets. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Sun visor in tape-trimmed braided paper straw with an elastic strap at the back.
5-pocket, knee-length skirt in washed denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, slit at the front and raw-edge hem.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button and flared legs with raw-edge hems.

Gently fitted, single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with peak lapels and a single button at the front. Jetted front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Small bag in grained imitation leather with a narrow shoulder strap and zip at the top. Lined. Size approx. 6x15x19 cm.
Wide top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front and short dolman sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Shirt in checked cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front, an open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Dress in soft sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and a lined, glittery tulle skirt.
Trainers in mesh and imitation leather with glittery details, a hook and loop fastening at the front, a padded edge and tongue, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles.
Flared top in soft jersey with an elasticated neckline and flounce at the top that continues across the shoulders. Overlocked edges.
Short-sleeved jersey top with a print motif on the front and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Sleeveless dress in a jacquard weave containing glittery threads with a concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist and a very wide skirt and tulle underskirt. Lined.
Hairbands in an organic cotton weave with a bow.
Pyjamas in soft, cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Puffer jacket in woven fabric with a hood, stand-up collar and chunky zip down the front. Detachable tie belt at the waist, welt side pockets with a press-stud, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
5-pocket trousers in washed cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a button.

Set with a dress and head accessory in printed jersey. Dress with a round neckline and small opening with a hook and loop fastening at the back of the neck. Accessory in double-layered fabric with a hook and loop fastener at the back.
Metal and plastic hair clips in various designs. One with sparkly glass stones, one with pearly plastic beads, one in a tortoiseshell pattern and one in a solid colour. Length approx. 7 cm.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and picot trims.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in ribbed jersey with a sheen. Small stand-up collar and a diagonal cut-out section at the top of the front.
Short jumper in a soft cable knit with a slightly wider neckline and dropped shoulders.
Narrow belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 1.5 cm.
Gently flared dress in a double layer of embroidered tulle with an opening and button at the back of the neck, gathers at the top and short, flounced sleeves. Lined.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Top with raglan sleeves, buttons down one side and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Trousers with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Joggers in sturdy stretch cotton twill with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Short T-shirt in soft jersey with a trim in a contrasting colour at the neckline and sleeves.
Baby Exclusive. Sun hat in a soft weave lined in a cotton weave. Ties under the chin (not in size 0-4M).
Calf-length beach kaftan in an airy, patterned weave with a V-neck at the back, open sides and tie belt at the waist. No fasteners.
Half-shaft wellingtons with a loop at the back, fabric linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Wide blouse in an airy weave with a gathered grandad collar, buttons down the front and long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Knee-length shorts in soft washed cotton with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Henley tops in ribbed cotton jersey with a button placket, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. One of the tops is patterned.

Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck, covered buttons at the top and short puff sleeves. Seam under the bust and at the waist with elastication at the back, a concealed zip in one side and a gently flared skirt with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Ankle-length trousers in airy denim. High, elasticated waist with pleats and ties, side pockets, fake back pockets and wide, straight legs.
Leather, knee-high boots with pointed toes. Leather linings, insoles and soles. Heel 8 cm.
Short dress in a crinkled, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and decorative buttons at the top. Short sleeves with a tie detail, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Leggings in sturdy cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist and reversible sequin panels down the sides of the legs (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins). Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in soft pile with a hood and dropped shoulders. Kangaroo pocket, elasticated cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem.

Shirt jacket in sturdy denim made from a cotton blend with a collar and buttons down the front. Low dropped shoulders, long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined. The polyester content of the jacket is recycled.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short cap sleeves.
5-pocket jeans in superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Imitation suede ankle boots with square toes, a zip in one side and decorative strap with a metal buckle. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 7 cm.
Cropped top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a turtle neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Dress in slub-cotton jersey with a decorative frill at the top, gathered seam at the waist and gently flared skirt.

Calf-length dress in a cotton weave with a round, gathered neckline and V-shaped opening with a hook-and-eye fastener at the front. Short, wide raglan sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the elbows. Detachable tie belt at the waist with tassels at the ends. Asymmetric seam around the skirt. Unlined.
Jersey top with a slightly wider neckline and long, wide sleeves.
Knee-length shorts in waffled cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Regular fit.
Sleeveless dress in a cotton weave with an embroidered bodice and broderie anglaise at the top and hem. Buttons at the back, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Lightly padded bomber jacket with a detachable, lined jersey hood. Ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, flap front pockets with a concealed press-stud, zipped sleeve pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Joggers in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, concealed pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Short dress in printed jersey with short sleeves and a concealed zip at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and elasticated crossover straps at the waist and sides. High-cut at the back.
Straight-cut jacket in a wool weave with narrow notch lapels, flap welt front pockets, a chest pocket and an inner pocket with a button. Shoulder pads and long sleeves with slits at the cuffs. Lined.
Ballet pumps with pointed toes and a foot strap with concealed elastication. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Sleeveless dresses in organic cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
Fitted top in glossy jersey with a deep V-neck with decorative lacing at the front and long sleeves.

Knee-length dress in a soft, patterned weave with a V-neck and covered buttons down the front. Short sleeves with gathers at the top and a slit and tie at the cuffs, and a seam at the waist with an A-line skirt. Unlined.

Ankle-length trousers in a woven viscose blend. High waist with pleats at the front and covered elastication at the back, and a zip fly and button. Side pockets, fake back pockets with a button, and tapered legs with creases.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a ribbed polo neck and ribbing with slits at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
